title: cannot view the skin in full image when purchasing skin from store
body: when buying skins, i want to view the skin in full image, but couldn't find a button that can redirect to a full skin image

replies.body:
Click on "Learn more".
http://i.imgur.com/UUd9LdH.png?noredirect

Then, click on "Skins" right below the champion's name.
http://i.imgur.com/VUnvnFP.png?noredirect

{{champion:17}}
